about.fun_workshops_text: Join our interactive and fun workshops that make learning a new language exciting like an adventure. We've designed these sessions to be enjoyable, filled with laughter, and focused on improving your speaking skills.
about.inspired_learning_method_text: Our unique teaching method draws inspiration from the rich traditions of African communities. Just like the children who gather around the 'arbre Ã  palabres' to learn values, our approach brings together the best of language teaching experiences from the United States, France, and our deep African roots in Senegal.
about.explore_together_text: Language learning is more enjoyable when you embark on this journey with fellow learners from around the world. Connect with others who share your passion for languages, cultures, and new experiences.
about.empower_your_voice_text: We believe that learning a language is about more than just words; it's about finding your voice. Our platform empowers you to express yourself confidently in a new language, helping you unlock a world of opportunities and connections.

hero.title: Explore, Learn, and Connect through Languages
hero.subtitle: by EFEL CENTER

cta.meetPeople: Learn and speak with People from around the world

clt.title: Communicative Language Teaching
clt.description: Focus on real-life communication and interaction. Engage in role-plays, debates, and discussions.

tpr.title: Total Physical Response
tpr.description: Combine language learning with physical activity. Use gestures and movements to associate words with actions.

storytelling.title: Storytelling
storytelling.description: Dive into the art of storytelling. Share and create stories, enhancing comprehension and expression.

dailyJournal.title: Daily Journal Writing
dailyJournal.description: Maintain a daily journal in English or French. Write about your day, thoughts, or experiences using new vocabulary.

languagePartner.title: Language Partner Conversations
languagePartner.description: Pair up with a language exchange partner. Set a weekly conversation schedule to chat and share in the target language.

recipeTranslation.title: Recipe Translation
recipeTranslation.description: Translate recipes from English or French into your native language, combining language learning with culinary skills.

languageMedia.title: Language Podcasts and Videos
languageMedia.description: Listen to podcasts or watch videos in the target language, then summarize or answer questions for comprehension.

virtualQuiz.title: Virtual Language Quiz
virtualQuiz.description: Participate in online quizzes covering grammar, vocabulary, and culture for self-assessment and fun.

pictureStorytelling.title: Storytelling with Pictures
pictureStorytelling.description: Write short stories or describe scenes based on shared images, utilizing English or French creatively.

mediaClub.title: Movie and Book Club
mediaClub.description: Watch movies or read books in the target language, then discuss them focusing on language, plot, and culture.

onlineGames.title: Online Language Games
onlineGames.description: Recommend and play language learning games and apps for interactive vocabulary and grammar practice.

socialMediaChallenge.title: Social Media Challenge
socialMediaChallenge.description: Engage in weekly language challenges on social media, like posting photos with captions in the target language.

flashcards.title: Flashcards and Vocabulary Lists
flashcards.description: Learn new words through shared vocabulary lists and practice with custom-made flashcards.

penPals.title: Pen Pals
penPals.description: Connect with pen pals who speak the target language, exchanging letters or emails for authentic communication.

accents.title: Exploring Different Accents
accents.description: Identify and practice various English and French accents through interactive exercises.

etymology.title: Etymological Curiosities
etymology.description: Discover the fascinating origins of words in both languages.

news.title: News Reading
news.description: Engage with current events and practice language skills through reading and discussing news articles.

bav.title: Black American Vernacular
bav.description: Learn about and explore the nuances of Black American Vernacular English.

funnyWords.title: Funny-Sounding Words and False Friends
funnyWords.description: Explore amusing words, tongue twisters, and false friends between English and French for a fun linguistic twist.

exonyms.title: Discovering Exonyms
exonyms.description: Learn how different cultures refer to places and landmarks in their languages, enriching geographical and cultural knowledge.

languageChallenges.title: Language Puzzles and Challenges
languageChallenges.description: Engage in crossword puzzles, word searches, and creative writing challenges using funny words, false friends, and exonyms.

accentRecognition.title: Accent Recognition and Practice
accentRecognition.description: Practice imitating different accents and discuss the unique pronunciation and intonation patterns.

madeUpWords.title: Creating New Words
madeUpWords.description: Invent and share new words, exploring the creativity and playfulness of language.

museum.title: Adventure in time
museum.description: Guided visit, theme tours to discover.

outdoor.title: Explore outdoor
outdoor.description: Invent and share new words, exploring the creativity and playfulness of language.
